title: Fort Pulaski National Monument: Things to Do
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do             Things To Do       Fort Pulaski National Monument offers visitors the chance to experience many interesting and exciting activities year-round. Fort Pulaski itself is a large-scale outdoor exhibit. The main structure, together with outlying works including demilune, drawbridges, ditches, and dikes, is a fine example of historic military architecture. Indoor exhibits highlight the history of Fort Pulaski from the fort's construction, to its eventual fall due to advancing military technology. Click on the links at left to learn more about the activities Fort Pulaski offers the entire family.        Enjoy your visit to Fort Pulaski FOPU
